```{r}

res_ATN1_CP1_v2$genus


genus %>%
  tidyr::separate(col="genus", into=c("Domain","Phylum","Class","Order","family","Genus"), sep=";")
  
  
  
  res_ATN1_CP1_v2 %>%
    tidyr::separate(col="genus", into=c("Domain","Phylum","Class","Order","Family","Genus"), sep=";") %>%
    ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x=Genus,y=log2FoldChange, col=Family)) +
```
